title: The Bloody almanack wherein is contained : ... the King of Scots new game in France, together with his desires to forreign princes ... concerning the landing of an English army in France ; the time and manner of a great battel to be fought : the engagement of the Scotch King, with the event and success thereof : with other notes ... touching the strange lightnings and apparitions that will be seen in the ayr this year ...
author: Booker, John, 1603-1667.
publisher: Printed by R. Wood, for G. Horton,
notes: Occasionally attributed to John Booker, or John Napier--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
